G

Game - Class in domain
The abstract Game class defines the common structure and behavior for Gomoku games.
Game(int) - Constructor for class domain.Game
Constructs a Game object with the specified size and percentage of special elements.
GameConfig - Class in presentation
The GameConfig class represents a dialog for configuring the settings of a Gomoku game, including board size, game mode, players, and other options.
GameConfig(Dimension, int, int, GomokuGUI) - Constructor for class presentation.GameConfig
Constructs a GameConfig dialog with the specified screen size, width, height, and parent GUI.

GoldenSquare - Class in domain

Gomoku - Class in domain
The Gomoku class represents a game of Gomoku, a two-player strategy board game.
